title: The Best Moves Ever in this Animation!

embed.description: The 2018 season is here. Take the first step and begin your climb. Click below for more info: Honor in 2018 https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/honor 2017 and Beyond | Riot Pls https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yTpS-2jiTqU The 2018 season starts soon https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/competitive/2018-season-starts-soon

body: Can you see Taliyah actually trying to pull the rocks with her arms, can you feel effort in doing it!? It was so cool to see her actually drifting through the sand, and then MF hair? Looking awesome, then Lucian with his quick strikes? I want a movie with this quality! My favorite cinematic ever! GJ Riot, we are here wishing for a movie!

replies.body: really need a lucian vs thresh event
Not gonna lie. I only watched this just now (probably would have watched it later anyway) because I saw Lucian in the thumbnail, and that meant there was a possibility of Thresh showing up.

When I watched that video I had the biggest, dopiest smile on my face the whole time! Some personal highlights, for me:

* The overall flow and pacing of the video. This was a project lovingly crafted from start to finish, and it's really cool to see what they can do with the medium, in so little time, and how much they can pack in. I keep going over it to look for easter eggs and goodies! It's overall just amazing!
* Yasuo looking like THAT. Jesus. Riot's secret mission statement continues to be making the most aesthetically pleasing characters in any video game, ever.
* Talia's giant wall, gave me goosebumps.
* Full AP Blitzcrank KSing Ekko's kill.
* Miss Fortune's whole personality--I love her character so much. She's SUCH a badass, and it shows so much in this scene. She wakes up, surrounded by a giant tentacle monster, clearly just got blown up, things are looking bad, and what's this girl's number one priority? "Where is my gun so I can kill someone?" What a woman.
* Thresh waiting for Lucian to clear the minion wave so they can rotate mid. (Also the generally swooshiness of Lucian. The difference in movements and body language... somebody loved this cinematic.)

If this was a trailer for a movie I'd be l o s i n g my mind right now.
Which easter eggs did you find? (edit: one spoiler Easter Egg in comments below)

Yasuo's flute has a fire symbol on it (I don't recognize it though)

You can see shuriman towers (possibly sun disks?) right at the beginning of Taliyahs scene when the camera pans in front of her

nagakeborous sinks MFs ship

The arcane comets falling from the sky are clearly Xerath's. I dunno if that hints Taliyah will be taking Azir's side in the eventual war that's building up in Shurima, but it does strike me as a strong possibility.
Technically Xertah hates everything now doesn't he? You don't have to be on anyone's side when the opponent believes everyone is his enemy.

That's untrue. Xerath doesn't hate anyone other than Azir (because he was kept as a slave for several decades even though they shared a fraternal bond) and the Ascended brothers Nasus and Renekton (because they trapped him for millennia).
He also doesn't mind collateral damage.
Obviously. Just like Azir, he comes from a different time with very different values.

Renekton does, but Xerath? That's less clear.

Evidently he wants to rule Shurima, which suggests that it IS possible to be on his side.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot cottonfxn,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AV3Q686X,comment-id=00050001,timestamp=2018-01-14T23:03:02.205+0000)
>
> Which easter eggs did you find?

yasuo running it down mid
That's not an easter egg now is it

Red and blue arrows, so possibly a war against Frejlord and Noxus with yasuo caught in the middle? Last hit in yasuos frame was like Ashe's frost arrow judging my the blue effects and hard impact it could be ice.

Taliyah possibly fighting against Xerath judging by the lighting particles flying at her in the upward angle like Xeraths ult.

Blizcrank VU coming? he finally have legs.  judging by the corrosive effect of the shot at ekko possibly some connection to who made urgot.

Miss fortune vs Illaoi judging by the spirit looking tentacles that illaoi controls.

Lucian vs thresh on shadow isle judging from the appearance of the area maybe they are at the "gates of hell."

Pretty good! Cat is out of the bag now with a lot of Easter eggs found between here, other forums from other regions, social media and reddit.

The one that was discovered verrrrry last was a younger, 2 legged version of Boggin in the employ of the "Sons of Ur".  Bonus points if anyone even knows who Boggin is. :)
isn't Boggin the guy from the warwick trailer?
You got it!

Can someone post a link to all the different Easter eggs found from all reigons?

Boards and YouTube is all I know.

The blue in the last Yasuo frame was just the transition to Taliyahs scene. So no Freljord there.

The corrosive weaponry is common in Xaun, visible even in the Chmetech Tryn skin.

Lucian and Thresh were probably fighting at the gates to the castle and dungeon where Thresh resided as a human.

The blue blast in yasuo's last frame sounds completly different from the ones landing in Taliyah's scene.

Possibly, i dont read too much on zaun, probably my least favorite location in league lore xD.

For Thresh and Lucian, I find that Thresh himself and  horde of Zombie/Shadow demons seems to be protecting something more than just it being his domain.  To my knowledge, I dont think thresh has control over the dead besides his hunger to capture and torture strong will souls.
Xaun? What the hell is that
Oops i meant Zaun, its the location where champions like ww and ekko is from.
I find the lack of Freljord champions and Poros disturbing.
So happy Taliyah was in acinematics. this was really epic.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot cottonfxn,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AV3Q686X,comment-id=00050001,timestamp=2018-01-14T23:03:02.205+0000)
>
> Which easter eggs did you find?

How about we put Diana in the next pull of Champions that will get animated Riot
Leona was Animated Now i want to see Diana
{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

I'd rather have both.

http://www.reactiongifs.com/r/bth.gif
Isn't the entire video an Easter Egg propheting coming of another Rune Wars consisting of several smaller wars?
I absolutely adore the transitions between scenes. The flow of the entire thing is so satisfying.
It is beyond satisfying! It's gorgeous! 2 minutes of pure talent, congrats to all involved in this project! {{sticker:sg-kiko}}
Right, the first scene would be the greatest version of this propaganda video.
don't forget to mention ekko hopping on others that are frozen in time, so awesome
it was so accurate, showing his weak body yet his genius strategy, really cool
and it featured full ap blitzcrank
1:12 "When you mess up your combo"
blitz watching like : report ekko intentional feeding

Report Yasuo for hax

Dashing without enemies to dash to
one word, Awesome!
2 words, SUPER AWESOME
Blitzcrank's laughing though.
One of my favorite parts of this cinematic is seeing Xerath's Arcane Barrage obey the laws of sound.  You see the 5-6 blasts of Arcane Barrage THEN you hear the sound of them being fired.
It was so meticulous in those matters that got me so many chills down the spine, damn.
I just love the spam laugh that Blitz does after he ults.
Not gonna lie, the amount of detail in this is spectacular.
Feel bad for all the people who haven't seen their favorite champion in a cinematic like this :(
I can't wait to eventually see morde animated like this
Can't wait to see Orianna, Anivia, and Azir T_T
Mortal Reminder was at least a little bit of something.
Instead of arrows in beginning, they should have used Ornn Ulti
Taliyah's clothes look so much more delicate in the cinematic than in game. In game they are bulky and heavy looking.
